naslov: Kaštel Sućurac, Kuća103 m2, 2-sobni stan+studio apartman u prizemlju (prodaja)
opis: EKSKLUZIVNA PRODAJA!!  NOVO U PONUDI IZVRSNA PRILIKA ZA OBITELJI + DODATNI APARTMAN ZA NAJAM! U Kaštel Sućurcu na 50 m od mora i obale, smjestila se ova lijepa kamena kuća iz koje se pruža pogled na more. Kuća je kompletno renovirana 2022. godine, novi zatvori, instalacije, kupatila, kuhinje, stepenište, namještaj.... Kuća ima 2 odvojena stana: Stan 1 - idealno kao apartman za najam Ima svoj zaseban ulaz sa suprotne strane kuće, nalazi se u blagom suterenu istočne orijentacije, ima 33 m2 i u naravi je studio apartman. Ima odvojeno kupatilo, kpl opremljenu kuhinju sa prozorom, bračni krevet, flat TV,,,Kompletno je opremljen i od 2022 je bio u kratkoročnom najmu u ljetnoj sezoni. Izvrstan izvor prihoda. Stan 2 - dvoetažni stan na 1 i 2 katu kuće - 70 m2 Ovaj dio kuće ima zaseban ulaz sa vanjskim stepeništem. Na prvoj etaži nalazi se otvoreni plan: dnevni boravak+kuhinja+blagovaona i kupatilo sve južne orijentacije sa stepeništem na drugu etažu. Na drugoj etaži nalaze se 2 spavaće sobe i mali balkon sa krasnim pogledom na more. Sve su sobe klimatizirane i u svakoj je TV sa priključcima Izvrsno je povezan autobusnim linijama do Splita i Trogira. U blizini na 50 metara je glavna gradska plaža, slobodan parking za automobile, market, šetnica, kafići, škola i vrtić su udaljeni 5 minuta hoda rivom. Do aerodroma 15 km, do Splita 10 km. Vlasništvo 1/1 EXCLUSIVE SALE !! GREAT OPPORTUNITY FOR FAMILIES + ADDITIONAL APARTMENT FOR RENT! This beautiful stone house with a sea view is located in Kastel Sucurac, 50 m from the main beach. The house was completely renovated in 2022, new windows, installations, bathrooms, kitchens, stairs, furniture .... The house has 2 separate apartments: Apartment 1 - ideal as an apartment for rent It has its own separate entrance from the opposite side of the house, is located in a mild basement of eastern orientation, has 33 m2 and is in nature a studio apartment. It has a separate bathroom, fully equipped kitchen with window, double bed, flat TV ,,, It is fully equipped and 2020 was in short-term rent in the summer season. An excellent source of income. Apartment 2 - duplex apartment on the 1st and 2nd floor of the house This part of the house has a separate entrance with an external staircase. On the first floor there is an open plan: living room + kitchen + dining room and bathroom all south orientation with a staircase to the second floor. On the second floor there are 2 bedrooms and a small balcony with a beautiful sea view. It is well connected by bus lines to Split and Trogir. Nearby at 50 meters is the main city beach, free parking for cars, market, promenade, cafes, school and kindergarten are 5 minutes walk along the waterfront. To the airport 15 km, to Split 10 km. Ownership 1/1
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Grijalice i radijatori na struju
